text: Juan Carlos Ferrero Donat (born February 12, 1980) is a Spanish retired professional tennis player. He won the French Open in 2003.Sports Around the World: History, Culture, and Practice, eds. John Nauright; Charles Parrish (Santa Barbara, CA: ABC-CLIO, 2012), p. 316 Ferrero was ranked world number 1 from September 8 to November 2 in the same year. == References == Category:1980 births Category:French Open champions Category:Living people Category:Male tennis players Category:Spanish tennis players Category:World No. 1 tennis players
title: Juan Carlos Ferrero
